name: In_Limbo
description:
Minting this memento into a part of the blockchain as an everlasting reminder of the moment I discovered digital arts and the mental state I was in, exactly 10 years ago, today. August 29, 2011.

*Did my first ever digital piece on iPod Touch, using ArtStudio app.
*Picture acquired from Instagram Story's "On This Day" feature.

4:5 ratio, 1200x1500 JPEG
